definition.name: PR Quiz
definition.description: A GitHub Action that uses AI to generate a quiz based on a pull request
definition.author: dkamm

inputs.name: openai-api-key
inputs.description: OpenAI API key for API access

inputs.name: ngrok-authtoken
inputs.description: The ngrok authtoken to use for the server hosting the quiz.

inputs.name: model
inputs.description: The model to use for generating the quiz.  It must be a model that supports structured outputs. Defaults to 'o4-mini'.

inputs.name: lines-changed-threshold
inputs.description: The minimum number of lines changed required to create a quiz. This is to prevent quizzes from being created for small pull requests.

inputs.name: time-limit-minutes
inputs.description: The time limit to complete the quiz in minutes. This prevents the action from running indefinitely.

inputs.name: max-attempts
inputs.description: The maximum number of attempts to pass the quiz. A value of 0 means unlimited attempts.

inputs.name: exclude-file-patterns
inputs.description: A list of file patterns to exclude from the quiz as a JSON-ified string.

inputs.name: system-prompt
inputs.description: Optional override for the system prompt. Be sure the specify that multiple choice questions must be returned.
